mapper.insert: insert into interviewList(user, id, name, addr, school, subject, type, year, admission, typical, pass, time, people, kinds, how, tip, content1, content2, day, point, comment) values(#{user}, #{id}, #{name}, #{addr}, #{school}, #{subject}, #{type}, #{year}, #{admission}, #{typical}, #{pass}, #{time}, #{people}, #{kinds}, #{how}, #{tip}, #{content1}, #{content2}, now(), 0.0, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from interviewList a, memberList b where a.id = b.id and (b.admin = '판매자' or b.admin = '메인관리자')
select * from interviewList a, schoolList b where a.user = b.user and a.user = #{user} and a.school = b.school and b.pass = '합격' and a.subject = b.subject and b.auto = #{num};
select * from interviewCommentList where interviewNum = #{num} order by auto desc limit 5 offset #{page}
mapper.insert: insert into interviewCommentList(interviewNum, id, comment, point, day) values(#{interviewNum}, #{user}, #{comment}, #{point}, #{day})
mapper.select: select count(*) from interviewCommentList where interviewNum = #{num}
mapper.update: update interviewList set point = point + #{point}, comment = comment + 1 where auto = #{interviewNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from interviewList a, memberList b where a.id = b.id and (b.admin = '판매자' or b.admin = '메인관리자') and (a.school like #{word} or a.subject like #{word})
